query: SELECT name, title, details FROM stakeholders WHERE workflowId = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM workflows) LIMIT 10
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2sFSf5cpMcz3VU3.root --database V5mU5KaxouRWtQ7kmCeQrU --execute SELECT name, title, details FROM stakeholders WHERE workflowId = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM workflows) LIMIT 10

rows.name: Sarah Miller
rows.title: Director of Customer Experience
rows.details: Responsible for overseeing all aspects of the customer journey, from initial contact to post-purchase support. Her focus is on improving customer satisfaction and retention through enhanced service delivery and personalized interactions. She is particularly interested in data-driven insights to optimize CX strategies.

rows.name: David Chen
rows.title: Head of Product Development
rows.details: Leads the product development team, focusing on innovation and aligning product features with customer needs and market trends. He is keen on understanding customer pain points directly to inform future product roadmaps and prioritize new features that address user feedback. He values solutions that offer clear ROI and competitive differentiation.

rows.name: Maria Rodriguez
rows.title: Chief Marketing Officer (CMO)
rows.details: Oversees all marketing initiatives, including brand strategy, digital campaigns, and customer acquisition. Her primary goal is to increase brand awareness and drive customer engagement. She is interested in understanding how customer feedback can be leveraged in marketing messaging and how new technologies can enhance marketing effectiveness and personalization.

rows.name: James Thompson
rows.title: VP of Sales
rows.details: Manages the sales team and is responsible for revenue generation and market share growth. He is highly focused on understanding customer needs to close deals and identify upsell opportunities. He would be interested in solutions that provide sales enablement tools, improve lead quality, and shorten sales cycles.

rows.name: Emily White
rows.title: Customer Support Manager
rows.details: Manages the day-to-day operations of the customer support team. Her key responsibilities include ensuring efficient resolution of customer issues, training support staff, and implementing tools to improve support efficiency and customer satisfaction. She is particularly interested in solutions that reduce ticket volume, improve first-contact resolution, and provide better insights into common customer problems.
